comment.body:
Padavan: https://bitbucket.org/padavan/rt-n56u
The original version of Padavan does not contain lnmp.
Padavan wiki tells you how to set up Entware. https://bitbucket.org/padavan/rt-n56u/wiki/EN/HowToConfigureEntware

`pip install -r requirement.txt` should be `pip install -r requirements.txt`
